description: Mitsubishi has delivered quality for years and this car is no exception. This Mitsubishi L200 Sportero  2010 Full option  has travelled a total of 290000km and features a Manual transmission system as well as other great features. Priced at Rs.5300000, this car is fantastic value for money. Don’t forget to mention Carmudi when you contact the seller!
name: Mitsubishi L200 Sportero  2010
